title: [New post] Apple expands mobile phone billing for App Store and other services to three more countries
text:
Zac Hall posted: " Apple has slowly been expanding mobile phone billing (or carrier billing) to additional countries, and three more have been added to the short list of supported countries this week. Customers in Austria, Italy, and Singapore can now use mobile phone b" Respond to this post by replying above this line New post on 9to5Mac Apple expands mobile phone billing for App Store and other services to three more countries by Zac Hall Apple has slowly been expanding mobile phone billing (or carrier billing) to additional countries, and three more have been added to the short list of supported countries this week. Customers in Austria, Italy, and Singapore can now use mobile phone billing with select carriers where available.
Read more of this post
